Class AddLeastCorrelatedFeature

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
MutationInterface
public class AddLeastCorrelatedFeature
extends AbstractMutation

Increases the number of selected features (ones) by one adding the feature (switching zero to one) which is least correlated with already selected features
